title: Villa di Teodorico
description: A palatial Roman villa and bath complex that has been connected with Theodoric the Great, with twentieth century interpretations labeling it as Theodoric's "hunting lodge". More recent excavations have uncovered evidence for earlier building phases, dating from the first century B.C. through the third century A.D.

properties.title: OSM location of the so-called "Villa di Teodorico"
